descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 30 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Face your fears and reclaim your calm inside an immersive VR experience.

ClaustrOFF is designed for people who feel anxious in confined spaces, elevators, airplanes, tunnels, underground areas, or medical environments such as MRI scanners. It uses controlled exposure principles to help you gradually face and manage fear and anxiety in a safe virtual space.

The full version includes multiple environments, including a pyramid and an underground shelter, and realistic simulations of elevators, airplanes, and MRI scans. 

Through interactive challenges and structured guidance, ClaustrOFF teaches practical techniques to stay grounded under pressure, regulate breathing, shift focus, and build emotional resilience. The progression system allows you to move at your own pace, lowering fear responses step by step. Your reactions are not judged; each session is designed to help you practice and learn.

Key features:
– Interactive gameplay informed by psychological methods for managing anxiety
– Multiple immersive environments with graded intensity
– Guided breathing, grounding strategies, and calming exercises
– Controlled exposure at a pace that respects personal limits
– Developed in collaboration with mental health professionals

Whether you are new to VR exposure, searching for a supportive tool for anxiety management, or simply curious about a new kind of challenge, ClaustrOFF offers a meaningful and structured path forward.
